paper_abstract: We exhibit a finite family of functions over a finite set (i.e. a finite algebra), such that the problem whether a given function can be obtained as a composition of the members of this family (i.e. is a member of the clone generated by the algebra) is EXPTIME-complete. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A finite set of functions with an EXPTIME-complete composition problem
